description.value: Major Boon: You spread your illusions over a larger area. You can designate an area to permanently gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mirage]. All creatures within this area gain the effects of illusory disguise, changing their forms as you wish. You can designate a new area as a 1-minute activity, but doing so dismisses any previously designated areas.
